Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Traits.Name: Great Junk Armor
Traits.Description: The first and second time the Hoarder is damaged by an attack or ability in a combat, reduce all damage to 0 and summon 2 valuables tokens in spaces in range 2 from them.

Actions.Name: Animate Junk Golem
Actions.Description:
The Hoarder summons a Junk Golem, a size 1 sturdy summon. 
- When summoned, or on the hoarder's turn, the golem can move 3 spaces, then shove an adjacent foe 2. If that foe collides, they are dazed. 
- The golem gains vigilance 1 at the end of the hoarder's turn and uses the hoarder's damage die for damage. 
- When the golem is defeated, drop 3 valuables in or adjacent to the space it occupied. 
- When the golem passes over a valuables token, it absorbs it, gaining vigor 1. It drops any tokens it picked up when it is defeated.

Actions.Name: Junk Storm
Actions.Effect: Deals bonus damage to characters holding at least one valuables token. Then, that character drops one valuables token in an adjacent space.

Actions.Name: Pile It Up
Actions.Description: The Hoarder creates a height 1 or 2 terrain piece in range 3. Characters adjacent to it when it is created are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Junk Form
Actions.Description: The Hoarder transforms into junk, then teleports either 3 spaces or adjacent to the location of any free valuables token.
